== Introduction ==

We are preparing Kubuntu Artful Aardvark (17.10) for Alpha 1 on  <nowiki>[[https://wiki.kubuntu.org/ArtfulAardvark/ReleaseSchedule | June 29, 2017]]</nowiki>. With this '''Alpha 1''' pre-release, you can see what we are testing in preparation for our next version.

The Kubuntu team will be releasing 17.10 in October.

'''NOTE:''' 

This is Alpha 1 Release. 
Kubuntu '''Alpha Releases''' are '''NOT''' recommended for:
* Regular users who are not aware of pre-release issues
* Anyone who needs a stable system
* Anyone uncomfortable running a possibly frequently broken system
* Anyone in a production environment with data or workflows that need to be reliable

Kubuntu Alpha Releases are recommended for:
* Regular users who want to help us test by finding, reporting, and/or fixing bugs
* Kubuntu, KDE, and Qt developers

Please '''report your results''' on the <nowiki>[[http://iso.qa.ubuntu.com/qatracker|Release tracker]]</nowiki>.

== Feedback ==

Development of Kubuntu 17.10, Artful Ardvark, is ongoing and bugs are fixed every day.  Before reporting bugs, please ensure your system is up to date.  For verifying installation related bugs, updated disk images are available from <nowiki>[[http://cdimage.ubuntu.com/kubuntu/daily-live/current/|Daily bootable images for standard PCs and laptops]]</nowiki>.

You can give us feedback on <nowiki>[[https://plus.google.com/u/0/107577785796696065138/posts|Google +]]</nowiki><nowiki>[[https://plus.google.com/u/0/107577785796696065138/posts|<nowiki>[[File:Kubuntu-Gplus.png]]</nowiki></nowiki>]] or <nowiki>[[https://www.facebook.com/kubuntu.org|Facebook]]</nowiki><nowiki>[[https://www.facebook.com/kubuntu.org|<nowiki>[[File:Kubuntu-FB.png]]</nowiki></nowiki>]] or <nowiki>[[https://twitter.com/kubuntu|Twitter]]</nowiki><nowiki>[[https://twitter.com/kubuntu|<nowiki>[[File:Kubuntu-Twitter.png]]</nowiki></nowiki>]].
